<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Login"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/login"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Authenticate and log into a wallet using its fingerprint. This must be called before most other endpoints.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the login endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Login to a wallet using a fingerprint","required":["fingerprint"],"properties":{"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"The unique fingerprint identifier of the wallet to authenticate with. This is a 32-bit unsigned integer that uniquely identifies each wallet key in the system.","example":1234567890,"minimum":0}},"title":"Login"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from login","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response from logging into a wallet","title":"LoginResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
